dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.tip.nra.ItuArcStateAndStatusList
dataStructure.description:
This data type contains a list of ITU Alarm Reporting Control (ARC) states and statuses. Each element of the list identifies a state or status and provides its relevant value. See R_TMF518_NRB_I_0004.

This datatype is not extendable
dataStructure.label: ItuArcStateAndStatusList

child.name: m3100_ALARM_STATUS
child.description:
This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: m3100_ALARM_STATUS

child.name: m3100_ARC_QI_STATUS
child.description:
This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: m3100_ARC_QI_STATUS

child.name: m3100_ARC_STATE
child.description:
This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: m3100_ARC_STATE

child.name: m3100_NALM_QI_INTERVAL
child.description:
This attribute contains the No ALarM reporting Qualified Inhibit interval. Alarm Reporting is turned off until the managed entity is qualified problem-free for a specified persistence interval. Values between 0 and 5940 are allowed which identify an interval between 0 and 99 hours with a one-minute granularity. The value "0" indicates that the timer is not running (i.e. no adjustments in time taking place). See ITU-T Recommendation M.3100.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: m3100_NALM_QI_INTERVAL

child.name: m3100_NALM_TI_INTERVAL
child.description:
Thia attribute contains the No ALarM reporting Timed Inhibit interval. Alarm Reporting is turned off for a specified timed interval. Values between 0 and 5940 are allowed which identify an interval between 0 and 99 hours with a one-minute granularity. The value "0" indicates that the timer is not running (i.e. no adjustments in time taking place). See ITU-T Recommendation M.3100.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: m3100_NALM_TI_INTERVAL
